name: pupillary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the pupil (= the circular black area in the centre of the eye): There may be uncontrolled movements, vomiting, breath holding, and pupillary dilation. Monitor the patient's blood pressure, pupillary changes, motor function, speech, and temperature.
More examplesFewer examplesStructural damage to the iris can also result in pupillary abnormalities. Pupillary constriction in response to a bright light shined in one eye demonstrates the integrity of the pathways. There was no relative afferent pupillary defect.
